name: The Unsafed Box Puzzle
description:
This is a new mind-challenging game. you took the responsibility
to save the world by diffusing complex puzzle bombs.
the game consists of weird and mind-blowing 3d puzzles which
challenge you. the bombs are designed by a precise and obsessive
villain who is literally against the human race.
the bombs become more challenging and complicated step by step as
you progress. as soon as you reach the 5th level, you must be a master mind to
solve it...
you need to find a way for challenging mechanical puzzles to solve.
in the other words, this game is one of a kind.
challenge your brain . have fun. :))
